A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First off\, huge fan of the series and was looking forward to all the answers I would get from this that the force awakens left us with. This movie though was atrocious... I've been so bummed with what they did. No questions were answered\, I feel like I was trolled by Disney\, and everyone I talked with felt the same. There were so many plot holes that I really can't fathom what any of the creators were thinking. I could have written a better thought out story in one evening and a couple drinks... Just really sad with what they have done... Sadly I don't see any way for them to redeem this
